data.name: Zombies Everywhere - Guide atlas
data.detailed_description:
The Guide atlas DLC is based on the full map scene of "Zombies Everywhere" game.
It contains 16 beautiful image files.
After successful installation, the DLC folder will be automatically generated in the game installation directory.
For example: ...\Steam\steamapps\common\Zombies Everywhere\Guide atlas

Statement: This guide atlas is only for collection and appreciation of players and shall not be used for commercial or non-commercial purposes. It shall not be copied and released without permission.

data.short_description: The guide atlas of "Zombies Everywhere" includes the exquisite drawings of the whole game scene and all hidden game props are visible!

fullgame.name: 末日竟在我身边 - Zombies Everywhere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: winxp,win7,win8,win10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
